Text.Page:
This could be the biggest construct in all of {@Rgn:49001}. Whenever I stare up at it I feel...humble. Almost.

I'd like to take a closer look. To do that, I need you to take out the yusul slashers. Think you can do that?

Outstanding. If I ever have children, I'm going to think about naming one of them after you.

Now all I need to do is live long enough to have kids.

Come on. We're not done yet.
